name: BattleMore
description:
Classic Strategy. Classic Fun.
Tension, gripping story lines, and highly competitive ladder are all things you won't find here. Instead, join the random escapades of a bloated military faction as they try to uphold peace through brute force.
​
This Real Time Strategy Game lets you command armies in a single player campaign with a variety of missions ranging from the insane to the merely absurd. A callback to both old and new strategy games alike, this game will keep you entertained and challenged.
